## IMessage interface

DIDComm message

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMessage
```

## Properties

| Property                                          | Type                                                            | Description                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| [createdAt](./core.imessage.createdat.md)         | string                                                          | Optional. Creation date (ISO 8601)                   |
| [credentials](./core.imessage.credentials.md)     | [VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md) \[\]     | Optional. Array of attached verifiable credentials   |
| [data](./core.imessage.data.md)                   | object &#124; null                                              | Optional. Parsed data                                |
| [expiresAt](./core.imessage.expiresat.md)         | string                                                          | Optional. Expiration date (ISO 8601)                 |
| [from](./core.imessage.from.md)                   | string                                                          | Optional. Sender DID                                 |
| [id](./core.imessage.id.md)                       | string                                                          | Unique message ID                                    |
| [metaData](./core.imessage.metadata.md)           | [IMetaData](./core.imetadata.md) \[\] &#124; null               | Optional. Array of message metadata                  |
| [presentations](./core.imessage.presentations.md) | [VerifiablePresentation](./core.verifiablepresentation.md) \[\] | Optional. Array of attached verifiable presentations |
| [raw](./core.imessage.raw.md)                     | string                                                          | Optional. Original message raw data                  |
| [replyTo](./core.imessage.replyto.md)             | string\[\]                                                      | Optional. List of DIDs to reply to                   |
| [replyUrl](./core.imessage.replyurl.md)           | string                                                          | Optional. URL to post a reply message to             |
| [threadId](./core.imessage.threadid.md)           | string                                                          | Optional. Thread ID                                  |
| [to](./core.imessage.to.md)                       | string                                                          | Optional. Recipient DID                              |
| [type](./core.imessage.type.md)                   | string                                                          | Message type                                         |
